page.title: 12A Farm Survey.
page.content: We soon discovered that the land within our block is used almost entirely for agricultural purposes.It therefore followed that one of our initial projects had to be closely connected with farming.Our surveying of the land use led us into contact with many of the farmers of the region,and they were very helpful in explaining the aims of their particular farms.We found that most of the farms were surprisingly similar in character.The average size of the farms is about 80 to 100 acres.They were of the intensive grassland variety,with the exception of one or two large acreage establishments.The largest farm of the area,with 850 acres is Lane Farm belonging to Mr.Trevor Trevor.We interviewed Mr.Trevor about his ideas on farming and his aims and hopes for the future
